trans-unit.source: Gets the category of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorCategory"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the category of the error.
Gets the error code for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception.
A value that identifies the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception error.
Gets the message that describes the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception.
A message that describes the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception.
Gets the name of the source server for which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception occurred.
The name of the source server that is involved in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception.
Gets the name of the target server for which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception occurred.
The name of the target server that is involved in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception.
